description: Electronic Health Record integration for patient data retrieval

fetch_patient.description: Fetch patient demographics and basic information
fetch_patient.returns: patient demographics (name, DOB, MRN, primary care provider)
fetch_patient.notes: Requires patient_id or DOB for lookup

fetch_med_list.description: Retrieve current medication list for patient
fetch_med_list.returns: list of active medications with dosages
fetch_med_list.notes: Includes prescription and OTC medications entered in system

fetch_allergies.returns: list of known allergies and reactions
